infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: HeartCheck may use the camera to capture photos for relationship memories and check-ins.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: HeartCheck may access your photo library to select images for relationship memories and check-ins.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: HeartCheck may use the microphone to record audio for relationship memories and check-ins.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: HeartCheck may use your location to provide location-based relationship insights and check-ins.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: HeartCheck uses tracking to provide personalized relationship insights and recommendations.
